page.title: 01ATTITUDES
page.content: Keston is a beautiful place to live but it is inconvenient. It is essential to have a car to get anywhere because of the transport but if you have a car it is easy to get into Bromley and then into London quickly. The farmers in this area are annoyed a their E.E.C milk quotas which mean that their profits are cut and they are only just making a profit. Some of the residents consider the area to have too many horses which means that what used to be a peaceful area is inundated with people riding.
